title: Yedho Mayam Saeigirai Lyrics Wagah
stanzas:
ennanavo ennanavo ennanavo
enakkul aguthey
ullukulle ullukulle ullukulle
idhayam enguthey

thisaigal muluvathum panimalai
enakul yen adi erimalai
kadandhu porai oru murai
karainthu ponen palamurai

orunodiyil nee ennai nee
kaatrena saithu vittai

yaaro nee yaaro naan
endre naam irundhiduvoma
neeye naan naane nee
ondrai inaithiduvoma

innge naan irupena
uyir kodupena
unnai kadhalipena
anbale jeipena

unnai manapena
mugam kaathirupena
idhuvum kadandhu poguma
idhayam kadathi poguma
uruguthe uruguthe manam

idhe naal idhe naan
en vaazhvil thodangiduvendum
idhe pol idhe pol
unnodu nadathida vendum

nee vangum kaatrodu
naan kaatragi uyir sendhidavenudum
nee thungum veetodu
oru suvaragi parthidavendum

idhuvum kadandhu poguma
idhayam kadathi poguma
uruguthe uruguthe manam

seo.title: Yedho Mayam Saeigirai Lyrics Wagah
seo.description: Get the complete Yedho Mayam Saeigirai Lyrics Wagah from Wagah. Read the lyrics penned by Mohan Raj and composed by D Imman and sung by Jithin Raj. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Mohan Raj, Wagah, D Imman, Jithin Raj, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
